name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrofans Eye Dropper Zoom Pan Color Pick

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supports local file upload, paste from clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Good Enought Eye Dropper Support Zoom Pan, Color Pick

Chrofans Eye Dropper Support Zoom Pan,  Color Pick, Local File, Clipboard File. 

Pick color fast than photoshop and other tools. It is a productivity tool that greatly improves your color picking work. 

It is strongly recommended for front-end css/javascript developers and art staff to use it.
